dcterms:description: Stanford Sentiment Treebank provides around 11K sentences tagged with sentiment on a scale from 1 (most negative) to 5 (most positive). We filtered out neutral samples and dichotomized the remaining sentences into positive (4,5) and negative (1,2).
dcterms:title: SST2

dcterms:creator: Andrew L Maas
Raymond E Daly
Peter T Pham
Dan Huang
Andrew Y Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: IMDB Large Movie Review Corpus is a binary sentiment classification dataset containing 50K polarized (positive or negative) movie reviews, split into half for training and testing.
dcterms:title: IMDB

dcterms:creator: Andrew L Maas
Raymond E Daly
Peter T Pham
Dan Huang
Andrew Y Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: 20 Newsgroups contains around 19K documents evenly categorized into 20 different categories. We extracted samples belonging to the 'Baseball' and 'Hockey' classes for a binary classification task.
dcterms:title: 20NG
